message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own a unique item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $18000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $12000 for it. Can we meet in the middle?
I understand that $12000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to compromise. I can meet you halfway, but I need to make a bit more than that. How about we settle on $15000?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $15000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $13500 for the product. Can we meet at this price?

I'm starting to think that $13500 is a bit closer to what I'm looking for, but I still need to make a profit. How about we meet at $14000? I'm willing to give you a bit more wiggle room, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $14000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $13000 for the product. Can we meet at this price?

I'm starting to think that we're getting close, but I'm still not convinced that $13000 is the best price for this product. I'm willing to meet you at $14500, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal. I'm willing to make a final concession, but I need to know you're serious about buying the product.
I understand that you're trying to make a good deal, but $14500 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $13200 for the product. This is my final offer, please let me know if it's acceptable.
